description:
When demon activity starts becoming more and more active, Sam suddenly disappears in front of Dean`s eyes. When Sam comes to, he learns that Lily, Jake and other people who are holding special powers have been gathered together in a ruined ghost town. There, Sam and the others learn about their cruel fate and every detail about the dreadful plan imposed on them by the Yellow Eyed Demon.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Erabareshi Mono-tachi (Zenpen): All Hell Breaks Loose, Part 1
選ばれし者たち(前編) -ALL HELL BREAKS LOOSE, PART1-
